Why behind Primrose

We help medical practices adapt to the digital era

A letter from our founder & CEO

From an early age, I enjoyed building puzzles and lego sets and tinkering with various electrical gadgets. As a teen, I got hooked on computers and found engineering as my calling. I grew through the ranks at a leading IT consulting firm learning various business domains, gaining skills, and keeping up with the ever-changing technology.

An MBA made me realize what I wanted to do was build a company to help solve real-world problems. Merging my passion for technology with a desire for continued learning and out-of-the-box thinking, I like to bring out a complete solution to real-world problems in healthcare. He enjoys time on the lake in summer and skiing in winter.

We believe it is vital that medical professionals remain independent, individualistic, and profitable to address the needs of a diverse set of patients. And we believe that we have the experience and a diverse skill set to help medical professionals own and operate their own practices.

Milestones

  1. 2003

    Iris-Health; the Flagship company started with transcription

  2. 2007

    Built PM & EMR software

  3. 2008

    Diversified into billing service as transcription went down

  4. 2010

    Certified EMR for Meaningful Use

  5. 2015

    Created BPCI tracking software

  6. 2017

    Became MIPS Qualified Registry

  7. 2018

    Added dialysis tracking module for nephrologists

  8. 2020

    Building Trillium - Software for the digital age; built for collaboration

  9. 2021

    Building Primrose - Built for surgeons and interventionists

  10. 2022

    Building Cypress - Remote staffing to drastically reduce staffing costs

  11. 2023

    Building Tensaw - Marketing to enable practices to stand out in the marketplac

Our core values

Innovate, Serve, Sustain.

03

Iterate, Improve, Take Risks.

Take risks, iterate quickly with continuous improvement

04

Collaborate, Nurture, Succeed Together.

Nurture collaboration; promote teamwork ahead of individual goals

05

Profit, Invest, Research, Grow.

Make sustainable profits & invest back into R&D

Our Passion

Agile Clinic Growth

Help clinics start with minimal capital & scale quickly allowing clinics to maintain a flexible workforce

Empowering with Free Tools

Make internal tools available for free when we can

Patient-centric Revenue Solutions

Allow patients to self-service their needs and help clinics get paid for their work

Secure Healthcare Innovations

Build solutions with security in mind

Your questions, answered

Answers to the most frequently asked questions.

Yes, we include all revenue from services, including patient collections, whether you collect it or we collect it

Yes, we give credit towards certain expensive medications/infusions based on the actual cost (invoice needed). Please check with us on your specific situation.

Yes, we do prior authorizations for all tests, procedures & surgeries as a part of our premium service; If you need prior authorizations done with a basic plan, see Cypress plans for a support team that can get your tasks done at a fraction of the cost of employing on-premise staff.

We raise our invoice on a monthly cycle

We obtain your prior consent and process all payments as ACH from your bank account.

No, we don’t accept credit card payments to keep processing costs down.

You would reach out to your account manager or open a ticket. We will charge your account until any open questions are resolved.
